channel.title: Salicornia brachiata on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Salicornia brachiata on funPlantGenes

item.title: SbMYB15
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SbMYB15 Gene Name: R2R3 type MYB15 Genome: Species: Salicornia brachiata Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of a novel SbMYB15 from Salicornia brachiata confers salinity and dehydration tolerance by reduced oxidative damage and improved photosynthesis in transgenic tobacco.

item.title: SbSOS1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SbSOS1 Gene Name: salt overly sensitive 1 Genome: Species: Salicornia brachiata Functional Descriptions: The SbSOS1 gene from the extreme halophyte Salicornia brachiata enhances Na+loading in xylem and confers salt tolerance in transgenic tobacco.
